name: Coffee Application
desc: The Coffee app lets users order their favorite coffees just like food. It offers a quick, convenient way to customize and track coffee deliveries.

name: CoinPay App
desc: Secure mobile transactions with a simple interface for easy payments and money management.

name: Smart Home
desc: Control lights, AC, and devices with one click. Simple interface for easy home automation.

name: Fashion
desc: The Fashion app offers an intuitive design for easy browsing and purchasing clothing. It ensures smooth navigation and quick product selection.

name: Bitezz App Design
desc: The Bitezz app provides a seamless, visually appealing pizza-ordering experience with intuitive browsing, easy customization, and real-time updates.

name: Admin Panel Design
desc: The EV admin panel tracks vehicle status, battery levels, and maintenance. It offers tools for fleet management and performance optimization.

name: Food52
desc: The online food ordering website lets users browse menus, customize orders, and track deliveries with ease. It ensures fast, secure service.

name: DriveLine
desc: Drive Line is an automobile website showcasing detailed vehicle reviews. It offers easy navigation and insightful content.

name: Cooked
desc: Cooked is a website where top chefs share their best recipes. It offers an easy-to-navigate platform for discovering and trying new dishes.

name: E-Commerce Website Design
desc: The e-commerce design offers easy navigation, secure checkout, fast loading, and visually appealing shopping with accessible promotions.

name: Weather App Re-Design
desc: The Weather app redesign offers a sleek, user-friendly interface for real-time updates. It enhances navigation and visual appeal for a better experience.

name: Crypto Tracker
desc: The Crypto Tracker app provides an intuitive interface for real-time cryptocurrency price tracking. It ensures easy navigation and seamless updates.

name: Calories
desc: Calories is a gym app for learning workouts and tracking fitness progress. It offers a user-friendly interface and personalized plans.

name: Ezz Stays
desc: Ezz Stays is a mobile app for seamless hotel booking with an intuitive interface. It simplifies browsing and reservation.
